name: Rush To Pack
description:
Feed the dog to get past it.

The aim of the  game is to go around the house to pack items to go on holiday, but you have only 20 seconds to do it, there are different outcomes for different items so pick wisely, the items are a toothbrush, clothes, slippers, lunch and a laptop. Controls are A and D for left and right and W and Space to jump. I hope you enjoy it, you definitely won't get hours of game play out of it but for a few seconds it should be enjoyable. 

Please Play in 1080p sorry I didn't have time to sort scaling with camera.

Music - SOUND AIRYLUVS by ISAo https://airyluvs.com/

Dog Barking - dog bark sound http://soundbible.com/523-Dog-Growling.html
